name: 16 Bit XMAS 2012
overview: There's nothing more emblematic of the Holiday seasons than the cozy feeling you get waking to a fire and conifer brimming under with presents. That feeling of togetherness and warmth and holiday spirit shared while singing songs of the season with friends and family. That feeling you get taking a snowball square in the jaw from your freckle-faced neighbor, Scud Frackus. Payback time! Gather up three of your best friends for the newest Super Nintendo game by RetroZone, Snowball Fight, a four-player blizzard blast!
